title: nu如何让玩家自行用kit指令领取礼包
txt_content:
加入这条权限 领取礼包的时候也提示没有权限
kit/kitnucleus.kit.base送出礼包。、

replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content:
Per-Kit Permissions
Nucleus operates on per kit permissions. The permission to use a kit is then nucleus.kits.[name], where name is the kit’s name. This is in addition to the main permission to use a kit, nucleus.kit.base. If you wish to grant permissions for all kits, grant nucleus.kits.
https://nucleuspowered.org/docs/modules/kit.html


kit的每个礼包都有独立的权限 nucleus.kits.[name]

replies.author: hujixiang
replies.txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-290356-1-1.html
可以看一下这个帖子的关于kit的介绍
